pages.text: The Cold Snap Snowballer was your average snow golem, fenced into a one block area for weeks. All they ever knew was to throw snowballs at enemies. When a well placed creeper set the Snowballer free, they ran off, intent to punish the players who trapped them, collecting loose stones on the way to throw with their snowballs.

pages.title: Nether Snowballer
pages.text: A Snowballer, melted from the heat of the Nether. No one knows how or why a horde of snowmen decided going to the Nether would be a good idea, but those that have leave behind a trail of slush when they move.

pages.title: End Snowballer
pages.text: A Snowballer, mutated by the desolate environments of the end. Has a chance to teleport you or itself when attacking or attacked

pages.title: Plague Snowballer
pages.text: A Snowballer filled with the murky waters of the swamp. May transmit parasites and diseases, or generally make you feel unwell
